channel.title: For those of you who have another email account besides hotmail
channel.description:
always wondering when you try logging in on msn or try to log in and it won't let you well heres the solution,
go to http://passport.net
then click get start now.
sign in then continue ( must have a hotmail account first) now fill in the required informantion and then contunie. after you have filled in the informantion GO BACK TO YOUR HOME EMAIL INBOX (Not hotmail sing in)
click the link and now You can use that Email account with msn
EDIT May have to save the images and then zoom in with them with paint or whatever :P
